sentences.sContent: It also can cause an endorphin rush that is quite pleasant and might make you forget about the heat.
sentences.sContent_eng: It also can cause an endorphin rush that is quite pleasant and might make you forget about the heat.
sentences.sCn: 此外，辛辣食物还会促进脑内啡的分泌，让你产生快感，忘掉炎热。

sentences.sContent: As a matter of fact, recent studies have shown that even the anticipation of laughter increases endorphin levels.
sentences.sContent_eng: As a matter of fact, recent studies have shown that even the anticipation of laughter increases endorphin levels.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，最近有研究显示，甚至对笑的期待也会增加内啡呔水平。

sentences.sContent: Smiling can help reduce the level of stress-enhancing hormones like cortisol, adrenaline and dopamine, increase the level of mood-enhancing hormones like endorphin and reduce overall blood pressure.
sentences.sContent_eng: Smiling can help reduce the level of stress-enhancing hormones like cortisol, adrenaline and dopamine, increase the level of mood-enhancing hormones like endorphin and reduce overall blood pressure.
sentences.sCn: 微笑可以帮助降低提升压力荷尔蒙的含量，如皮质醇、肾上腺素和多巴胺，增加提升情绪荷尔蒙的含量，如脑内啡，并降低整体血压。

trans.tranOther: a chemical produced by your body that reduces pain and can make you feel happier
